metadata.name: PowerShell Create Local User
metadata.comment: Detects creation of a local user via PowerShell

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-localuser')))

output.summary: Detects creation of a local user via PowerShell

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate user creation Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1136.001/T1136.001.md
